about.name: JM Hore
about.title: Front-End Web Developer and Designer
about.description: Hello, my name is JM Hore. I am a junior Front-End Web developer part-time gamer.

works.name: Portfolio
works.overview: Portfolio built primarly using React JS featuring different works and technology

features.name: JSON File
features.about: Custom JSON file storing all the relevent data for my portfolio.
features.reflection: I created a custom JSON file to store all of the data that I put out in my portfolio. This made my data easily accesible and I can output it however I want

features.name: Unique Mobile Navigation
features.reflection: I wanted to make a unique mobile navigation rather than having a normal dropdown menu. Inspired from the navigation menu from the old IPhones,

works.name: Movie Database
works.overview: A movie database built using React JS.

features.name: Web API
features.about: Web API to grab movies to be outputed and featured on a dynamic website.
features.reflection: Using TMDB API I made my own movie database showing all sorts of movies from trending to top-rated.

works.name: Capstone Project
works.overview: Woocommerce website about a fictional company called, Pacific Peak Adventures, selling tour packages available in British Columbia, Canada.
